overview: Tor founded Netadmin in 2004, after working in the telecom business since 1993. He has actively helped shaping the business and the company, as well as its products and services, ever since. Tor has been responsible for the development of broadband services and network design while being the CTO of Wasadata System, and worked as a contractor in the construction and facilitation business prior to that. Today, Tor works as the CTO of Netadmin Systems, with strategic, long-term tasks.
